node.title: Donald Trump booed by crowd in Texas after revealing he got COVID-19 booster jab
node.description: That's despite the former US President earlier this year saying the booster "probably" wasn't for him.
node.content: ["Former US President Donald Trump has faced a hostile crowd in Texas who booed him for revealing he got the COVID-19 booster jab.\n", "During a show in Dallas on Sunday night (local time), former Fox News host Bill O'Reilly, who's been travelling around the US with Trump as part of a 'History Tour', told the crowd he'd received his booster dose.\u00a0", "Trump, who was jeered at an Alabama rally earlier this year for urging his supporters to get vaccinated, then revealed he too has received his booster.\u00a0", "The former President tested positive for COVID-19 in October last year, just over a month before the US 2020 election that he lost to Joe Biden.", "\"Both the President and I are vaxxed,\" O'Reilly told the Dallas crowd on Sunday. \"Did you get the booster?\" he asked Trump.", "\"Yes,\" Trump replied, before being met with boos and jeers. That's despite Trump earlier this year saying he \"probably\" wouldn't bother with the booster jab.", "\"I feel like I'm in good shape from that standpoint,\" he told the Wall Street Journal. \"I'll look at stuff later on.\u00a0", "\"I'm not against it, but it's probably not for me,\" Trump added.", "During his time as President Trump, a Republican, downplayed the COVID-19 pandemic's severity, dismissed many preventive measures and undermined health experts.", "Trump went on to hold large rallies in the final months of his presidential election campaign despite public health guidance warning against large gatherings.", "But Trump has previously endorsed vaccines - at the same time taking credit for the US COVID-19 jab rollout.\u00a0", "About 61 percent of the US' population is fully vaccinated against COVID-19, according to Our World in Data.\u00a0", "Reuters / Newshub.\u00a0\u00a0"]
